backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with a single `ping` query function that returns 'pong'.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three implemented features (real-time clock on HomePage, new accent color options in SettingsPage/appStore, default light theme) to their source files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of key frontend source files, serving as a quick reference for the project's frontend structure.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom property color tokens for both light and dark themes, plus base body and border styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the React app, including PWA meta tags, Google Fonts preloads for Inter/Poppins/Roboto/Open Sans, and the root div with the main module script.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for 'MyOrganizer Pro' defining app name, icons, display mode, theme colors, and orientation.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing a cache-first with network fallback strategy for static assets, with cache versioning and notification click handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing tab-based navigation, lazy-loading Notes and Records pages, initializing app settings and seeding the database on mount, and registering the service worker.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingSp: Provides a spinning `LoadingSpinner` component and a `PageSkeleton` placeholder used during lazy-loaded page suspense.
frontend/src/components/common/Modal.tsx: Accessible modal dialog component with scroll lock, Escape key handling, focus management, configurable sizes, and slide-up animation.
frontend/src/components/common/ToastCont: Renders a stack of toast notifications (success, error, info) with icons and dismiss buttons, sourced from the toast Zustand store.
frontend/src/components/home/QuoteWidget: Home page widget that displays the current daily quote with custom font/color/alignment styling and navigates to the Quote page on tap.
frontend/src/components/home/StreakWidge: Home page widget showing the current streak count, last check-in date, and a today-checked indicator, navigating to the Streak page on tap.
frontend/src/components/home/TodayRoutin: A clickable widget for the home screen that displays today's routine profile (up to 4 items) with formatted times, using the useRoutines hook to fetch the appropriate day profile.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Root layout component that composes the desktop sidebar, main scrollable content area, and mobile bottom tab bar into a full-screen flex layout.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppSideba: Desktop-only sidebar with app logo, navigation buttons for all main tabs, and a footer attribution link; hidden on mobile via Tailwind's md breakpoint.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomTab: Mobile-only fixed bottom navigation bar rendering five tab buttons with active-state indicators; hidden on desktop via Tailwind's md breakpoint.
frontend/src/components/notes/LabelManag: A modal component for creating, renaming, and deleting note labels, with color selection and inline editing powered by the useLabels hook.
frontend/src/components/notes/MultiSelec: A fixed top toolbar that appears during multi-note selection, showing the selected count and buttons to archive, trash, or clear the selection.
frontend/src/components/notes/NoteCard.t: A grid card component for displaying a single note with support for custom colors, pinning, selection via long-press, checklist/image previews, and a context menu for quick actions.
A full-featured modal for viewing and editing a note, supporting text, checklist, and image note types with color picking, label assignment, reminders, and image upload with compression.
frontend/src/components/notes/QuickAddBa: A collapsible bar component that lets users choose a note type (text, checklist, or image) to quickly create a new note.
frontend/src/components/streak/CheckInBu: Displays the current streak count and a check-in button that becomes a disabled 'Checked In' state after the user checks in for the day.
frontend/src/components/streak/StreakCal: A navigable monthly calendar that highlights days the user has checked in, using a timestamp history array as input.
frontend/src/db/db.ts: Instantiates and exports a singleton OrganizerDB class that exposes typed Table instances for all app data stores (notes, routines, records, etc.).
frontend/src/db/idb.ts: A lightweight native IndexedDB wrapper providing a Table class with add, put, get, delete, toArray, count, and clear operations, replacing Dexie.
frontend/src/db/schema.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for all database entities including Note, RoutineProfile, Record, StreakData, QuoteData, Label, ImageBlob, and AppSettings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageStorage.ts: A React hook providing saveImage, getImageUrl, and deleteImage callbacks for managing image blobs in the IndexedDB imageBlobs store.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY AuthClient login, logout, and identity state with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLabels.ts: A React hook that loads labels from IndexedDB and exposes createLabel, updateLabel, and deleteLabel operations with success/error toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotes.ts: Custom React hook for managing notes stored in IndexedDB, providing CRUD operations, filtering by view/search/label, pinning, archiving, trashing, and bulk selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Minimal React Query hook that pings the backend actor to check connectivity, returning 'offline' if unavailable.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuote.ts: Custom hook for loading, saving, and rotating motivational quotes stored in IndexedDB, supporting shuffle and daily rotation modes.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecords.ts: Custom hook for managing journal/log records in IndexedDB with search, date-range filtering, CRUD operations, and JSON export.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoutines.ts: Custom hook for managing weekday and weekend routine profiles in IndexedDB, supporting item add/update/delete/reorder and completion toggling.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollLock.ts: Custom hook that locks and unlocks body scroll by toggling CSS position/overflow styles, preserving scroll position on unlock.
frontend/src/hooks/useStreak.ts: Custom hook for tracking daily check-in streaks in IndexedDB, handling streak continuation, resets, and today's check-in status.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining Tailwind base/components/utilities, OKLCH-based CSS design tokens for light and dark themes, and reusable component classes like note-card and masonry-grid.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home dashboard with a live clock, greeting, and widgets for streak, quote, and today's routine, plus a floating quick-add note button and footer.
frontend/src/pages/NotesPage.tsx: Full-featured notes page supporting create, edit, archive, trash, multi-select bulk actions, label filtering, search, and a quick-add bar with note type selection.
frontend/src/pages/QuotePage.tsx: Quote editor page with live preview, allowing users to customize text, font, color, alignment, blur, rotation mode, and manage a list of rotating quotes.
frontend/src/pages/RecordsPage.tsx: Records management page with search, date-range filtering, add/edit/delete via modal, and JSON export functionality.
frontend/src/pages/RoutinesPage.tsx: Routines page with weekday/weekend/today tabs, drag-to-reorder items, completion toggling, and a form modal for adding or editing routine items with time, icon, and duration.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page for theme, accent color, font, background image upload/removal, storage usage display, and full data export/import with confirmation flow.
frontend/src/pages/StreakPage.tsx: Renders the Streak Tracker page showing current streak count, total check-ins, a check-in button, last check-in timestamp, and a calendar history view.
frontend/src/store/appStore.ts: Zustand store managing app-wide settings (theme, accent color, font family) with functions to apply and persist each setting via localStorage utilities and CSS variable manipulation.
frontend/src/store/toastStore.ts: Zustand store for managing toast notifications with add/remove actions and auto-dismiss after 3.5 seconds, plus helper functions for success, error, and info toasts.
frontend/src/utils/dataValidation.ts: Provides a `validateImportData` function that checks imported JSON for required arrays (notes, routines, records, labels) and returns a validation result with any errors.
frontend/src/utils/imageCompression.ts: Exports `compressImage` and `generateThumbnail` utilities that use a canvas to resize and compress image files to JPEG blobs at configurable dimensions and quality.
frontend/src/utils/notificationService.t: Provides helpers to request browser notification permission and schedule a delayed browser notification at a specified timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/seedData.ts: Seeds the IndexedDB database with default notes, records, streak, quotes, and routines if each respective table is empty on first run.
frontend/src/utils/serviceWorkerRegistra: Registers the app's service worker (`/sw.js`) on page load for PWA support, silently ignoring registration failures.
frontend/src/utils/storage.ts: Thin localStorage wrapper for persisting and retrieving the three user settings: theme, accent color, and font family.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts, oklch-based color tokens, border radii, box shadows, and keyframe animations, with dark mode via class and typography/container-queries/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking existing features and pending feature requests for MyOrganizer Pro, including real-time date/time display, new accent color options (yellow/gold), and light theme as default.
